description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for cert-manager using OTLP metrics. Tracks certificate lifecycle, issuance, renewal, ACME client performance, controller sync activity, and process resource usage.
name: cert-manager
title: Cert-Manager Monitoring

77eb91c1-7f5a-4af0-8cf0-bde0a9c10e97.name: deployment.environment
77eb91c1-7f5a-4af0-8cf0-bde0a9c10e97.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') AS `deployment.environment`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'certmanager_certificate_ready_status'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `deployment.environment`
ORDER BY `deployment.environment` ASC

d4604064-1996-4c2b-a3ed-6bf59507f0fe.name: namespace
d4604064-1996-4c2b-a3ed-6bf59507f0fe.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'namespace') AS `namespace`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'certmanager_certificate_ready_status'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `namespace`
ORDER BY `namespace` ASC

82240d0f-5f2a-472a-ab64-017814176438.name: cluster
82240d0f-5f2a-472a-ab64-017814176438.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'cluster') AS `cluster`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'certmanager_certificate_ready_status'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `cluster`
ORDER BY `cluster` ASC

widgets.description: Total number of Certificate resources tracked by cert-manager across all namespaces
widgets.title: Total Certificates

widgets.description: Number of certificates currently in Ready=True state
widgets.title: Active Certificates

widgets.description: Total controller sync calls for certificate reconciliation
widgets.title: Certificate Requests

widgets.description: Current clock time reported by cert-manager controller, confirms the controller is running
widgets.title: Clock Time

widgets.description: Number of certificates grouped by issuer name, showing distribution across issuers
widgets.title: Certificates per Issuer

widgets.description: Rate of controller sync calls for certificate issuance operations per second
widgets.title: Issuance Rate

widgets.description: Rate of successful ACME HTTP client requests (status 2xx) vs total, indicating issuance health
widgets.title: ACME Request Success Rate

widgets.description: Number of certificates with renewal timestamp in the past, indicating they are due for renewal
widgets.title: Certificates Pending Renewal

widgets.description: Rate of controller sync operations for certificate readiness checks, reflecting renewal processing throughput
widgets.title: Renewal Sync Rate

widgets.description: Average duration of ACME HTTP client requests in seconds, reflecting certificate renewal/issuance latency
widgets.title: ACME Client Request Duration

widgets.description: Rate of controller sync calls for certificate issuance. Spikes may indicate issuance retries or errors.
widgets.title: Issuance Controller Sync Rate

widgets.description: Rate of controller sync calls for certificate trigger operations. High rates indicate frequent renewal triggers.
widgets.title: Trigger Controller Sync Rate

widgets.description: ACME HTTP client request rate broken down by status code, helping identify error responses from ACME servers
widgets.title: ACME Client Errors by Status

widgets.description: Total CPU seconds consumed by the cert-manager process over time
widgets.title: CPU Usage

widgets.description: Resident memory usage of the cert-manager process in bytes
widgets.title: Memory Usage

widgets.description: Total controller sync call rate across all controllers, a proxy for overall cert-manager activity and restarts
widgets.title: Controller Sync Activity

widgets.description: Rate of outbound ACME HTTP API requests per second, broken down by method
widgets.title: ACME API Request Rate

widgets.description: Rate of all controller sync calls, representing cert-manager event processing throughput
widgets.title: Event Processing Rate

widgets.description: Rate of ACME HTTP client requests with non-success status codes, indicating API failures
widgets.title: Failed ACME Requests
